pages.title: Web Development
pages.description: With a bachelors degree in Computer Science and proven work experience, I have a passion for leveraging state-of-the-art frameworks and technologies to design, develop and deploy creative and engaging web experiences.

pages.title: Videography
pages.description: My creativity and passion for directing, producing and editing professional videos and documentaries have allowed me to create beautiful and engaging projects that have a lasting impact on the lives of others.
